de.jannlab.data

Class Sample

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.data.Sample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Sample
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class represents samples. A sample has an input and a target sequence. These sequences consist of vectors. All vectors of the sequences are mapped on a flat buffer.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
